attributes.action: Make Mps resign for lying to the electorate to gain power.
attributes.additional_details: I feel their is a need to stop Mps from saying one thing to the electorate to gain a seat in parliament and then renegue when the issue is brought up. Mr Cameron without doubt said he would give the voting public a referendum on the EU and has clearly and without question lied to all. I expect an MP to have integrity, but lately this seems to be evaporting. I think this should apply from the next election.
